channel.title: NetworkAutomation on NetSecOps Navigator

item.title: Megaport API
item.description: Introduction In this blog post, I will discuss utilizing the Megaport API from the end customer’s perspective. As you may already know, Megaport works with SDN (Software-Defined Networking) and leverages extensive automation in the backend. It provides both production and development environments to test your API queries with the provisioned circuits. You can find the API reference guide and additional details at :Megaport API Documentation. As an end client, I would like to use the API to run various calls against my circuits.
